alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Washington (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 01 at 2:23PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Washington and southern Jefferson Counties through 300 PM EDT... At 222 PM EDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm over Moxley, or near Louisville, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind and increased chance of a brief tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...While winds should result in minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects, this storm has also exhibited localized rotation. A brief tornado could quickly form. Locations impacted include... Louisville, Wadley, Davisboro, Bartow, Riddleville and Moxley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for east central Georgia.
